title: 630 BE for getting lvl 43
body: What the fuck is this, getting from lvl 42-43 took roughly 20 games, and you give me 630 BE for it? On the old IP grind system, if you played at 50% win rate in a norms game, you'd earn around 100ip per game, so If we had the old grind system I would've made like 2k ip, what's wrong with you goons, 630 BE from hitting lvl 43??? 630??? i got four 450ip champ shards and one 1350 one, and the 1350 one is FIDDLESTICKS, I DON'T WANT FIDDLESTICKS YOU FUCKIN GOOBERS FIDDLE HAS BEEN TRASH AND OUT OF META GARBAGE SINCE HE WAS RELEASED IN 1994 RIOT, and you have the AUDACITY to give me a collective 630 BE from playing 20 games, what the FUCK.

replies.body: Riotards will try to defend this {{champion:122}} {{summoner:14}}
You should have received at least the minimum of 810 BE, if this is not the case then there was an error and you should submit a support ticket to have it rectified.

dude, 810? 810 fucking BE? for playing 20 games, dude? 20 games? they average 30 minutes a game, that's 10 fucking hours man! what, okay, I guess I'll get the new champ that comes out in like 70 hours of gameplay, ok, that seems worth to me.

810 is the *minimum* roll. The average is 900 and something and the high is 1200 and something. Many of your recent games were <30 minutes so you'll be getting less EXP per game than the average player as well.
and the minimum roll is a consistent thing you will get around 50% of the time, so either way it's shit.
Dude don't worry the majority of the community doesn't like this bullshit either and if Riot doesn't listen their player base is going to drop, maybe then they'll stop being so stubborn.
